root: ^Actually, it is raining today pretty much, isn't it?
^By the way, do you like rainy weather?

like: ^You know... those sounds and the whole atmosphere...
^It is so calm... So you might for a moment forget about everything that bothers you...
^And in a place I live, It does not rain at all...
^Oh, I got distracted, I am sorry
dislike: ^Sometimes they are problematic, if you need to be outside at the moment, right?
^Maybe I like it because I can't see it very often...
^Anyway it is quite strong, so I guess it is going to end soon.
main2: ^Oh, by the way, I told you that I read you bio... And I want to ask you...
^Do you actually remember, what happened to you?
^Do you... want to know? I wont tell you if you don't want to hear.
face: ^So... you were found somewhere in mountains...
^It seems like you fell through the snow into a cave...
^Your bio says... that the fall caused your brain critical damage...
^And now... your body is completly paralyzed except your right hand and the head...
^But, even if the situation is this bad...
^Doctors will find a way to help you, I am absolutely sure!
^And you are very strong, I know that.
^Despite your state you found strength to hear the truth.
escape: ^Take it as slow as you need.
main3: ^We can utilize this coin a little more, aren't we?
^Let's do this... I toss this coin in the air, and after it lands you are guessing is it heads or tails, got it?
